title: If the universe is expanding, will it eventually stop expanding and start to collapse in on itself? - Quora

response.answer_text: Beyond any reasonable doubt, and by all means, the universe IS expanding. It is NOT in question… However, the question if the universe will ever stop expanding and retract back to its (supposedly) original point is yet about to be answered. With more knowledge, more and more (real) scientists are agreeing that the universe will continue to expand forever, and faster with time. So, we can answer that, as it appears today - and based on what we could learn and experiment so far -, looks like the universe will not stop expanding.
No, it’s in a runaway accelerating expansion. Dark Energy Drives Runaway Universe
